title: Multisig Solutions
description: Multisig, short for multi-signature, is a security protocol that requires at least two keys to authorize a transaction. It can be seen as a lock that only opens with enough keys out of a predefined set of keys. Enhance the security of your bitcoin wallet with multisig.

links.title: Sparrow Wallet
links.description: Sparrow is a modern desktop Bitcoin wallet application supporting most hardware wallets and built on common standards such as PSBT, with an emphasis on transparency and usability.

links.title: Specter Desktop
links.description: Your Bitcoin node, on your hardware, paired with your signing devices, creating secure wallets for bitcoin self-custody.

links.title: Nunchuk
links.description: Security. Inheritance planning. Ease of use.

links.title: Keeper
links.description: Bitcoin Keeper is an open source, bitcoin-only app designed for seasoned bitcoin hodlers. Built to store bitcoin over a prolonged period of time, Keeper helps you source, clean, and stack sats across different kinds of wallets.

links.title: Liana
links.description: Liana is a simple Bitcoin wallet leveraging on-chain timelocks for safety and recovery.

links.title: Caravan
links.description: Caravan is a Bitcoin multisig wallet you can host locally and use right in the browser.

links.title: Casa Keymaster
links.description: Casa Keymaster multisig is the safest way to store your bitcoin. Own your keys for total peace of mind.
